About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, my name is Caden. I am a self-taught programmer looking to soak up any new information that I can learn! Some of my hobbies/interests include: hiking, video-games, programming, and just having a good time at whatever I do.

The Home Depot

Cashier / Customer Service

  • Memorized locations of hundreds of retail items throughout the store.
  • Handled thousands of dollars daily with no strikes.
  • Prompted customers to sign-up for a Home Depot Credit Card.

Panda Express

Cashier

  • Responsible for counting cash register and deposit correct amount into safe.
  • Raised over $600 in donations for Dell Children's Hospital in 3 weeks.
  • Interacted with over 200 customers in a single 6-hour shift, and prompted them with proper customer service.

Webworks

Graphic Designer

  • Made graphic designs for gaming clans.

Pflugerville Pfence Company

Manual Labor

  • Door-to-door quoting for fences in Pflugerville and Manor areas.
  • Surveyed and completed fences in an 8 plot neighborhood in the span of 2 weeks.
  • Responsible for putting in equal amounts of strenuous work and time with my team.
